item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>We, too, saw penguins on the Cape penninsula yesterday - becoming a family hangup?!! Hope you got our email from Cape Point. The weather has been windy but hot - the wind now dropped and we are off to Robben Island (Mandela's prison) by catamaran today. The hotel is absolutely fantastic and I will not want to do anything when we get back. Very nice group of people to travel with. Love to everyone who logs on to see your sight - several hotels that we visit have this internet service available (free!!) Give our love to Rotorua and think of Therese</p>
item.content:encoded: We, too, saw penguins on the Cape penninsula yesterday – becoming a family hangup?!! Hope you got our email from Cape Point. The weather has been windy but hot – the wind now dropped and we are off to Robben Island (Mandela’s prison) by catamaran today. The hotel is absolutely fantastic and I will not want to do anything when we get back. Very nice group of people to travel with. Love to everyone who logs on to see your sight – several hotels that we visit have this internet service available (free!!) Give our love to Rotorua and think of Therese
